para.text: You can save the image in the middle of a debugging session and exit Dolphin. Later when you restart the image you can resume the debugging session exactly where you left off.

I like to think of this as the "messy bedroom" metaphor. It's like a child's idea of heaven, when your mum doesn't tell you to tidy your bedroom each night before you go to bed. This way you don't have to spend time getting your toys out again in the morning; they're already to play with as soon as you wake up.
